Module com.boslott
Package com.boslott.DataAccess

Class UCertdbCustomerDAO

java.lang.Object
com.boslott.DataAccess.UCertdbCustomerDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
CustomerDAO
public class UCertdbCustomerDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements CustomerDAO
A UCertdbCustomerDAO object is a CustomerDAO object used to interact with Customer data from a UCertify database data source
Author:
Steven Slott

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    UCertdbCustomerDAO()
    Constructs an UCertdbCustomerDAO object and gets a connection to the UCertify database data source

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.Boolean deleteCustomer​(int ID)
    Deletes a Customer entry from the UCertify database that has the customerID of ID
    java.util.ArrayList<Customer> findAllCustomers​(java.lang.Boolean refetch)
    Gets all Customer objects from the local ArrayList or calls the private class method to get all Customer objects from the UCertify database.
    Customer findCustomer​(int id)
    Gets a single Customer entry from the UCertify database with the customerID property value of the given id
    Customer findCustomerByName​(java.lang.String name)
    Gets a single Customer entry from the UCertify database that has the customerName property value of the given String name
    java.lang.Boolean insertCustomer​(Customer newCustomer)
    Inserts a new Customer entry into the UCertify database with the property values of those contained in the newCustomer object (except the customerID)
    java.lang.Boolean isAllowedToDelete​(int IDToDelete)
    A Customer entry may not be deleted if it has Appointment entries related to it.
    java.lang.Boolean updateCustomer​(Customer custToUpdate)
    Updates a Customer entry in the UCertify database with the property values of those contained in the custToUpdate object

    • UCertdbCustomerDAO

      public UCertdbCustomerDAO() throws java.sql.SQLException
      Constructs an UCertdbCustomerDAO object and gets a connection to the UCertify database data source
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there is a database access error

  • Method Details

    • findCustomer

      public Customer findCustomer​(int id)
      Gets a single Customer entry from the UCertify database with the customerID property value of the given id
      Specified by:
      findCustomer in interface CustomerDAO
      Parameters:
      id - the customerID of the Customer entry requested from the UCertify database
      Returns:
      the Customer object containing the data of the Customer entry requested with the customerID of id

    • findAllCustomers

      public java.util.ArrayList<Customer> findAllCustomers​(java.lang.Boolean refetch)
      Gets all Customer objects from the local ArrayList or calls the private class method to get all Customer objects from the UCertify database. If refetch is true or if the local ArrayList of Customer objects is null, the method calls to the UCertdb again. If retch is false, the method returns the locally cached results.
      Specified by:
      findAllCustomers in interface CustomerDAO
      Parameters:
      refetch - whether to call the UCertify database again or not
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of all Customer Objects

    • insertCustomer

      public java.lang.Boolean insertCustomer​(Customer newCustomer)
      Inserts a new Customer entry into the UCertify database with the property values of those contained in the newCustomer object (except the customerID)
      Specified by:
      insertCustomer in interface CustomerDAO
      Parameters:
      newCustomer - a Customer object with the property values for the new Customer entry being inserted into the UCertify database
      Returns:
      true if the insertion successfully completes, false if the insertion does not successfully complete

    • updateCustomer

      public java.lang.Boolean updateCustomer​(Customer custToUpdate)
      Updates a Customer entry in the UCertify database with the property values of those contained in the custToUpdate object
      Specified by:
      updateCustomer in interface CustomerDAO
      Parameters:
      custToUpdate - the Customer object containing the property values with which to update the Customer entry, including the customerID of the requested Customer entry
      Returns:
      true if the update successfully completes, false if the update does not successfully complete

    • isAllowedToDelete

      public java.lang.Boolean isAllowedToDelete​(int IDToDelete)
      A Customer entry may not be deleted if it has Appointment entries related to it. This method calls to the UCertify database and requests all Appointment entries for the Customer entry with the customerID IDToDelete. If the Customer entry has Appointment entries related to, the method returns false.
      Specified by:
      isAllowedToDelete in interface CustomerDAO
      Parameters:
      IDToDelete - the customerID of the Customer entry with which to search the UCertify database for related Appointment entries
      Returns:
      true if there are not any related Appointment entries to the Customer entry, false if there are related Appointment entries

    • deleteCustomer

      public java.lang.Boolean deleteCustomer​(int ID)
      Deletes a Customer entry from the UCertify database that has the customerID of ID
      Specified by:
      deleteCustomer in interface CustomerDAO
      Parameters:
      ID - the customerID of the Customer entry to delete from the UCertify database
      Returns:
      true if the deletion successfully completes, false if the deletion does not successfully complete

    • findCustomerByName

      public Customer findCustomerByName​(java.lang.String name)
      Gets a single Customer entry from the UCertify database that has the customerName property value of the given String name
      Specified by:
      findCustomerByName in interface CustomerDAO
      Parameters:
      name - the customerName property value of the Customer entry being requested from the UCertify database
      Returns:
      the Customer object containing the data for the Customer entry in the UCertify database with the customerName of name
